segments.text: Good morning , how are you doing today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been feeling pretty good , Dr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , I can see by your chart that you are here for your annual physical .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am playing on the tennis team this year , and they are requiring me to get a physical exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are basically going to check your heart , lungs , blood sugar levels , and eyes , ears , and nose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ Ve being kind of been having problems being out of breath . Can you look at that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will check you for asthma , and maybe we can check you for allergies later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . What will the blood test tell you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will be checking for blood sugar , cholesterol , and white blood cell count .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been working hard to stay healthy . I hope the tests turn out well .
segments.speaker: S2
